title: Low Tide on Grand Pré - revelation strikes as

content.prompt: Lines 41-45 (“So all...were naught”) indicate that the revelation strikes those who experience it as

choices.label: permitting them to see into the future
not measuring up to their expectations
preventing them from progressing beyond it

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
